original_title: Emirati social media influencer Khalid Al Ameri in Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: COLOMBO(News 1st): Top social media influencer Khalid Al Ameri is currently in Sri Lanka. He will be in the island from the 2nd to the 5th of June.

Khalid Al Ameri Emirati blogger mostly known for his YouTube content alongside his wife Salama Mohamed. He also creates content for various other platforms with the aim of giving his audience a jolly good time as well as motivating them.
Khalid Al Ameri has over 13 million people watching his content on his channels.
Khalid Al Ameris visit to Sri Lanka is important as he portrays the uniqueness of the place or country he visits.
Khalid  was featured in the 2020 list of '100 Most Powerful Arabs' by Gulf Business as well as being first social media personality to be awarded a Dubai Star in the Downtown Dubai Walk of Fame.
